document.full_text: a united nations plane crashed while trying to land at the airport serving congo's capital, kinshasa, on monday, killing 32 people, u.n. officials said. one person aboard survived.
document.title: u.n. plane crashes in congo killing 32
lines_and_colors: a united nations plane crashed while trying to land at the airport serving congo's capital, kinshasa, on monday, killing 32 people, u.n. officials said. one person aboard survived.
